challenges.title: Q1: Simple Landing Page
challenges.description: Build a single-page landing layout with: a header (site title + navbar), a hero section (big heading + button), a features section with 3 feature cards, and a footer. Use flexbox and basic responsive design.
challenges.outputDescription: A clean, structured landing page layout.
examples: Hero button could say 'Get Started' or 'Learn More'.
challenges.starterCode:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>My Landing Page</title>
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <style>
        /* Add your landing page CSS here */
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <header>
        <!-- Logo/title + nav -->
    </header>

    <section class="hero">
        <!-- Big heading + subtitle + button -->
    </section>

    <section class="features">
        <!-- Three feature cards -->
    </section>

    <footer>
        <!-- Footer text -->
    </footer>
</body>
</html>

challenges.title: Q2: Theming & Polish
challenges.description: Improve the landing page by choosing a color palette (primary, secondary, background) and consistent font styles. Add hover effect on buttons and links.
challenges.outputDescription: Landing page with consistent theme and hover interactions.
examples: Use :hover to change button background or link color on hover.
